description:
When a number of female murder victims are discovered in Ueno Park with lilac flowers in their mouths and one of Shizuru`s books by their side, rumor spreads that he may have some involvement in the case. Worried for her friend, Tsugumi learns that the murders seem to be inspired by a certain book where both Shizuru and Sasagoi-san have ties to the author. When Shizuru is taken away by the police for questioning, Tsugumi works with the rest of Fukurou to find the real killer before it`s too late.
Source: crunchyroll
